extendedInfo.description: -Description:This is an audio recorder.The sampling rate can be set to 48,000 Hz.You can record very high quality sound with this high sampling rate.This application can be used as a high quality voice recorder.Files recorded with this sound recorder are saved in lossless wave format.You can play recorded files with personal computers.This application shows the waveform and frequency spectrum in real-time by using FFT.There is no limit to length of recorded files.There is a pro version without advertisement.-PermissionsRECORD_AUDIO: to use MIC.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: to save files to SD card.INTERNET: for advertisement. (This permission is not required in pro version.)ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: for advertisement. (This permission is not required in pro version.)

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: This app is very good. Great for measuring the voice levels. The wave forms add a level of information about your voice and it is a fun if you play and compare different peoples voices.
reviews.author: Venkat Paluri

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: A great recording app. The waveform and spectrum  displays update live while recording which is great for more professional recordind.
reviews.author: Daniel Bisegna

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Would be five stars if ads did not cause recorder to stop when they pop up or switch.
reviews.author: Eric W

reviews.title: i love thiss!
reviews.comment: this is fantastic the awesome thing to bout this iz wen u record n tryna record a song itll capture the bass of the song ,unless u have cheap speakers, love the waveform thas dope
reviews.author: Michael Aguilar

reviews.title: several questions regarding sound recording
reviews.comment: Really great job. Best audio recorder ever, will definitely help to promote it.   I am working on a research project. We are trying to record high frequency sound (15K-20K). You app is the only one which bypassed filters and achieved the best performance. If you interest, may I ask several questions regarding how did you do it? I really appreciate your help. Please send me email at wdiyou@ufl.edu if you are interested to know more about my project. Thank you
reviews.author: Di Wang

reviews.title: Pure Audio Recorder.
reviews.comment: I think this is the closest to having a good quality recording for a mobile device. Gives out great audio sound. I recommend this to any user.
reviews.author: Map Ashoona

reviews.title: Stanly
reviews.comment: Great app. Amazing sound quality. There is one more essential thing that will make this the best app in its functionality. That is the functionality of saving the file to the memory card.  Please take this into consideration and update it at the earliest. Thanks guys.

reviews.title: One heck of a recorder
reviews.comment: Excellent sound quality and with no recording time limit! I wish it can come with editing capabilities too! Good work. You can\' go wrong with this recorder.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant App
reviews.comment: Spent ages looking for a free sound recorder for a special event this evening....couldn\'t find anything I liked the look of....but kept looking...and found this little gem.  Excellent sound quality - no recording limit time.  I would THOROUGHLY recommend it.  Thanks to the developers.....great job.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t work on Jelly Bean
reviews.comment: Failed to initialize mic on Jelly Bean. Previously, works on Honeycomb (Galaxy Tab 10.1 P7500).
reviews.author: A Google User
